001package gbw.melange.events.observability.filters;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IPristineBiConsumer;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IPristineFilterChain;
005
006/**
007 * Intercepting Filter Patten
008 *
009 * @param <T> Type of the type the consumers (filters) consume
010 * @author GustavBW
011 * @version $Id: $Id
012 */
013public class PristineFilterChain<T>
014        extends FilterChain<T, IPristineBiConsumer<T>>
015        implements IPristineFilterChain<T, Integer>
016{
017    /**
018     * <p>Constructor for PristineFilterChain.</p>
019     */
020    protected PristineFilterChain(){}
021
022    /** {@inheritDoc} */
023    @Override
024    public void run(T old, T newer) {
025        for(FilterIdPair filterIdPair : filters){
026            filterIdPair.filter().accept(old, newer);
027        }
028    }
029
030
031}
